name: Alure

skills.name: Psychic Whip
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 3 times at random. Decreases the target's Turn Meter by 25% on each critical hit.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Damage +5%

skills.name: Temptation
skills.raw_description:
Attacks all enemies 2 times. Each hit has a 30% chance of placing a 30% [Decrease DEF] debuff for 1 turn. Places a [Sleep] debuff for 1 turn on targets under [Decrease DEF] debuffs.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 6 Cooldown -1
Lvl. 7 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%

skills.name: Hellish Blaze
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has an extra 30% chance of inflicting a critical hit. Will ignore 50% of the target's DEF.
Damage based on: [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
